name: City Dr Race
description:
Explore the city streets driving fantastic car! Be as fast as you can to reach the next check points and become the best driver ever with City Dr Race! Remember about your speed, improve your driving skills, fit into every turn and avoid crashes into the traffic commute!
Train your driving skills exploring the huge modern city! Fasten your seat belts, start the engine, grab the steering wheel, get ready to be really rapid and join this rush! Your only mission is to play this game as long as you can by fast reaching of check points in a limited time! So burst into the transport flow, avoid crashes and continue this city race!
Drive a car really fast but accurate, enjoy the views of this beautiful modern city, react with lightning speed and you’ll achieve a great success! Earn points to buy different boosters for your car like temporary speed up of time deceleration, which can slow down everything around you and complete your mission successfully! Unlock new difficulty levels for more fun and different interesting skins for your car! Enjoy City Dr Race game and master your driving skills!
Don’t forget to take account of the traffic commute, because the transport flow is really solid! Follow the arrow to collect checkpoints and get more time to race! Complete the very first difficulty level to unlock and buy new ones and have fun!
City Dr Race features:
• Outstanding city racing simulator
• Ultimate traffic commute
• Various types of interesting cars
• Addictive gameplay with simple and intuitive controls
Ride through the city streets on a fantastically colored car, be as fast as you can to reach the checkpoint and add more time to your race in City Dr Race!
